items.sentence: Tom insisted I put on this bulletproof vest.
Tom put out the fire with a bucket of water.
Tom was the only one who ever tried to help.
Tom asked Mary to help him clean the garage.
Is Tom still helping out at your restaurant?
I heard you were injured trying to help Tom.
Do you know what Tom's secret ingredient is?
Tom wasn't the only one who was very hungry.
I wondered why Tom didn't have a girlfriend.
Tom really wanted a cup of hot black coffee.
Tom often wears blue jeans and a blue shirt.
Tom wasn't sure what Mary was talking about.
Tom told you I wanted to talk to you, right?
Tom probably won't even try talking to Mary.
Tom may not want to be seen talking to Mary.
Tom knew you'd try to talk him out of going.
Is this the Tom you're always talking about?
Tom holds a high position in an oil company.
I can never stay angry at Tom for very long.
Tom has decided to stay with us for a while.
Both Tom and Mary are coming over for lunch.
Where did you tell Tom to put his suitcases?
Tom told me you wanted to go hiking with us.
Tom told me not to tell anyone, so I didn't.
Tom told me it would take about three hours.
Tom told his children it was wrong to steal.
Tom is the only one in the office I've told.
Think of all the things you should tell Tom.
Maybe you should do what Tom told you to do.
Tom didn't say anything about you coming by.
Tom looked through the window at the street.
Tom doesn't need to come into work tomorrow.
Tom got on his motorcycle and started it up.
Tom helped me to understand a lot of things.
Tom wants to know if you've heard from Mary.
Tom has been here as long as I can remember.
Tom had a look of determination on his face.
Tom lied about his age to get into the club.
Well, it turns out you were right about Tom.
Did you find out what happened to Tom's car?
How can you be sure Tom's telling the truth?
I wonder if I might speak to Tom personally.
I understand you had a little talk with Tom.
If you don't tell Tom what happened, I will.
Tom came to the train station to see us off.
This isn't the knife I confiscated from Tom.
I met Tom for the first time three days ago.
I haven't seen or heard from Tom since then.
Tell Tom I'm looking forward to meeting him.
I suggest you stay here until Tom gets here.
